resources.string:
This game product by where you can read the article on 'https://max.book118.com/html/2017/0725/124227804.shtm'.
 	 Thanks for the efforts made by people of depression!
 	 Here is the game introduced, select the only one picture who is smile in many negative faces.Yeah, isn't it very simple? Believe me, you will be positive if keep it 10 min at least every day after 3 months.
 	 Now come on hurry up! Best wishes to you!
 	 Sincerely BobMu.
应用没有获得网络访问或存储授权，暂时无法检查更新，如需更新应用，请前往\"设置-应用程序-SmileFun\"授权该应用相关权限
